title: Ideal Block for House Building for Urgent Sale
details:
This land with a 48 Feet Road Frontage only 125 Meters from the Nawala-Nugegoda Road available for quick sale.
Its only walking distance to the Nugegoda Town having access roads to Colombo 5 & Nawala too.
Very good land to build a luxury house.

Quoted Selling Price : LKR 2 Million PP[Negotiable]

NO BROKERS/AGENTS WILL BE ENTERTAINED
